name: Feint Effigy
description:
Play as a weird creature in a weird world who can summon statues of this world's inhabitants. 

Some creatures can be traded with, others must be destroyed. Both kinds will supply you with the means to make different statues.

Space bar to place a statue. Once placed, you can press Space Bar again to "activate" a statue when around certain types of creatures to destroy them  (Did not have time to implement the effect for activating a statue to destroy a creature).

Also there is no audio.

Recommended to play with a 16:9 aspect ratio.

This game is for Windows.

Made with Unity

Models made with Blender

https://twitter.com/TheOutlander37
